purpose: Facilitate interaction with WhatsApp Web multi-device version through an API, enabling automation and integration with other systems
principle: Builds on the Go programming language to interface with WhatsApp Web's multi-device capabilities, providing a RESTful API and webhook support
reusability: Offers a REST API for easy integration, supports webhooks for event-driven interactions, and includes a user interface for management
limitations: Dependent on WhatsApp Web's stability and updates; may require frequent maintenance to adapt to changes in WhatsApp's web protocols
name: go-whatsapp-web-multidevice
description: API for Whatsapp Web Multi Device Version, Support UI, Webhook & MCP
highlight: Supports WhatsApp Web multi-device API with UI, Webhook, and MCP integration
